guest_info.name: Chris Linsell
guest_info.title: Real Estate Technology Analyst
guest_info.specialty: New solutions to old questions in real estate technology

main_topics: The future of the National Association of REALTORS (NAR)
The impact of technology on real estate
The need for skill development among REALTORS
The potential for a national MLS system
The importance of data analysis in real estate

problems_addressed.specific_problem: The relevance and future of NAR in 2026
problems_addressed.solution_summary: NAR should focus on lobbying, data analysis, a national MLS, and raising entry standards.

problems_addressed.specific_problem: Lack of a unified MLS system
problems_addressed.solution_summary: Propose a national MLS system to unify data and improve accuracy.
Use AI to analyze MLS data for better client service.

target_avatars.relevance: The episode discusses how to leverage technology and data to gain a competitive edge.
target_avatars.key_takeaway: Utilize AI and data analysis to enhance client service and stay ahead in the industry.

target_avatars.relevance: The episode provides insights on future-proofing a brokerage by focusing on skill development and technology.
target_avatars.key_takeaway: Focus on raising the skill level of your team to adapt to technological advancements.

clip_worthy_moments.quote: Imagine if the NAR would say, 'Guys, it's time for a national MLS.'
clip_worthy_moments.why_clipworthy: It challenges the current fragmented MLS system and proposes a unified approach.
clip_worthy_moments.suggested_hook: Is it time for a national MLS system? Here's why it could revolutionize real estate.

clip_worthy_moments.quote: You can have AI do exactly what you were saying, start interpreting data in my local market.
clip_worthy_moments.why_clipworthy: Provides a specific tactic on using AI for data analysis.
clip_worthy_moments.suggested_hook: Want to leverage AI in real estate? Here's a tactic you can use today.

key_tactics.tactic: Use AI to analyze MLS data for client insights.
key_tactics.context: Connect MLS data to an AI engine to interpret local market trends.

key_tactics.tactic: Engage in local advocacy to enhance professional standing.
key_tactics.context: Attend local zoning and council meetings to influence decisions.

quotable_insights: The NAR might not be what you recognize a year from now.
If you can find a way to create that value in your own business, you have immediate advantage over all of your competitors.

resources_mentioned.name: corded.io
resources_mentioned.context: Recommended for agent recruitment and retention using AI.

resources_mentioned.name: Real Geeks
resources_mentioned.context: Suggested as a technology partner for lead generation and conversion.

episode_summary: In this episode, Chris Linsell discusses the potential changes facing the National Association of REALTORS and the impact of technology on the real estate industry. He emphasizes the need for REALTORS to level up their skills and suggests the creation of a national MLS system to unify data. The episode provides actionable insights on leveraging AI for data analysis and engaging in local advocacy to enhance professional standing.
